ROM.Changelog:
# Note : _Clean flash is recommended. Bug reports are not appreciated without Logcat. Builds will be available soon when maintainers will get free time. So don't ask for ETAs._.
- March Security Patch - Added Slim Recent - Added Recents Icon Pack Support - Now Battery Level Will Shown In Bottom Of Ambient Display - Now You Can Enable/Disable Roaming Indicator - Removed HD Icon - Some Other Fixes - Much More...!!
